instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U5000: What is U5000? This is the System Management Controller(SMC) in macbooks from 2013-2015.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display
threads.message:
The board draws 20V CPU gets warm too
liquid spill on the motherboard the affected area was <CHIP>U8510</CHIP> and <CAPACITOR>C7434</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C7436</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C7437</CAPACITOR> are corroded...
I replaced all components and no changes..
I took some readings around <CHIP>U8510</CHIP> compared diode mode readings to good board found <RESISTOR>R8592</RESISTOR> pin 2=<SIGNAL>BUF_SMC_RESET_L</SIGNAL> is 0.078 instead of 0.358..

Dont know how many volts passes the line now injected 0.9volts now found  <CHIP>U5000</CHIP> heating...
Then i replaced <CHIP>U5000</CHIP> board now draws 5V not coming up
Am sure i replaced it well..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display
threads.message:
Something else affected by heat.
Or the new SMC is bad.

Just in case, check diode mode to ground at <SIGNAL>EDP_INT</SIGNAL> lines of J8500.
Pay atention to pins 1 & 3.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display
threads.message:
Pin3=0.277
Pin1=0.003 from the processor i think ðŸ¤”

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display
threads.message: The board i removed the SMC board was working

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no display
threads.message:
The CPU is fucked off; eDP output is damaged.
Don't waste more time with this board...
